snippet: The renovation of the Yale University Art Gallery is complete, and the teaching museum is designed for active learning with an accessible collection.
abstract: Editorial praises renovation of Yale University Art Gallery, which has reopened after being transformed and expanded over 14 years.
lead_paragraph: The renovation of the Yale University Art Gallery is complete, and the teaching museum is designed for active learning with an accessible collection.

headline.seo: The Yale University Art Museum, Renewed
